description.default: The units for the past time for how far back to go to see if an app/flow is useful. Default is Month (for 6 months). Options are those of the Add to time action's Time Unit Parameter

label.description: The units for the past time for how far back to go to see if an app/flow is useful. Default is Month (for 6 months). Options are those of the Add to time action's Time Unit Parameter
